name: Heavenquaker Spear
description: Legendary spear that shakes the heavens. Deals massive damage with umbral energy.

name: Infernal Twinblades
description: Twin blades wreathed in infernal flames. Rapid strikes with wind propulsion.

name: Inkwell Fan
description: Elegant fan inscribed with ancient techniques. Channels jade energy for spell casting.

name: Mortal Rope Dart
description: Rope dart favored by common soldiers. Light and swift with wind affinities.

name: Nameless Spear
description: Mysterious spear with no recorded history. Glows with splendorous light.

name: Nameless Sword
description: Unidentified sword of unknown origin. Radiates pristine splendor.

name: Strategic Sword
description: Tactician's blade designed for precise strikes. Infused with jade resilience.

name: Vernal Umbrella
description: Spring-themed umbrella staff combining defense and offense. Channels wind magic.

name: Panacea Fan
description: Healing fan with medicinal properties. Distributes jade energy healing waves.

name: Soulshade Umbrella
description: Dark umbrella that manipulates shadow essence. Umbral magic specialist.

name: Stormbreaker Spear
description: Spear that breaks through storms. Crackles with electric wind energy.

name: Thundercry Blade
description: Sword crying out with thunder. Splendor-infused lightning strikes.
